issue.title: [C++] Don't try to dictionary encode dictionary arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6475](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6475). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With #5077 (or possibly #4949) behavior with dictionary arrays changed, leaving the explicit call to DictionaryEncode() redundant.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6475?focusedCommentId=16924151) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5299
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5299>
